alert.note: Alert for Collier; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:13PM EDT until September 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Collier County in southwestern Florida... South central Hendry County in southern Florida... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 513 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Big Cypress National Preserve, or 18 miles northeast of Everglades City, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Big Cypress National Preserve, Deep Lake and Miles City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
